title: UK proposes compensation scheme for victims of China bitcoin fraud
description: Crypto haul is at the centre of a High Court battle over a seizure of bitcoin now valued at £5bn

title: Polkadot Surges 3.15% as Blockchain Interoperability Gains Traction in 2025
description: On October 15, 2025, Polkadot (DOT) has been in a fairly stable situation in a comparatively peaceful cryptocurrency context, reporting a 3.15% gain in the last 24 hours. This surge is occurring as the overall crypto market is stable, with key holdings such as Bitcoin and Ethereum experiencing slight volatility. title: Brit is charged with founding huge crypto scam involving forced labour camps, with cops seizing £10.5 BILLION in bitcoin and freezing assets including 19 London properties, one of which is valued £100m
description: A British man has had more than £10.5 billion in bitcoin seized after he was charged with allegedly engaging in a massive crypto scam which saw the businessman use forced labour camps.

title: Top 2 cryptos analysts predict could outperform ETH and SOL this quarter
description: Ethereum (ETH) and Solana (SOL) have dominated the smart contract and DeFi markets for years. Yet, analysts now spotlight two different plays that might outperform them this quarter: Bitcoin (BTC) and Mutuum Finance (MUTM). While BTC anchors the market with its stability, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) brings a fresh DeFi structure designed to generate real on-chain […]
